title: Investigate Unauthorized Pet
description: During a routine inspection, a property manager notices evidence of an unauthorized pet (e.g., a dog bowl).

tasks.description: Review the tenant's lease to confirm the pet policy and if any pets are authorized.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the lease has a strict 'no pets' clause.

tasks.description: Issue a 'Cure or Quit' notice to the tenant regarding the unauthorized pet.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal notice is generated, giving the tenant a specific timeframe to remove the pet or vacate the property.

tasks.description: Schedule a follow-up inspection for after the notice period expires.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new inspection is scheduled in the system to verify compliance.
